pullrequest.title: Adding GameState class and tests to default branch

content.raw:
I just saw that you used both `///` and `//` for "Documentation inherited" and I got curious to learn which is the correct one. 

It turns out `//` is the correct one as explained [here](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/122/changes-to-doxygen-comments-and-formatting/diff#comment-44450), even though we have quite a few `/// Documentation inherited` in Gazebo still.
content.html:
I just saw that you used both /// and // for "Documentation inherited" and I got curious to learn which is the correct one.

It turns out // is the correct one as explained here, even though we have quite a few /// Documentation inherited in Gazebo still.
